channel.title: Rune-Pact Beta - Unique - Economy Based
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://img716.imageshack.us/img716/5959/playnowy.png[/img][url=http://www.rune-pact.com/index.php?page=page3176]Play Now![/url] [img]http://img42.imageshack.us/img42/1142/forumsb.png[/img][url=http://www.rune-pact.com/index.php]Forums![/url]
This Picture takes time to be loaded... [url=http://www.rune-pact.com/index.php?page=page3176][img]http://rune-pact.com/Advertising.png[/img][/url]
[img]http://img716.imageshack.us/img716/5959/playnowy.png[/img][url=http://www.rune-pact.com/index.php?page=page3176]Play Now![/url] [img]http://img42.imageshack.us/img42/1142/forumsb.png[/img][url=http://www.rune-pact.com/index.php]Forums![/url][/CENTER]
I'm happy to announce that BETA released today and I'm not only excited but stressed out. I realized that there is still a lot to do, but we will get a lot of work done as time persists. Please post any bugs you can find, because the most time staking process in a project is testing, which is what BETA players are for.
Also, here are some things you should know about BETA:
[ul][li]All in-game accounts and forum posts that refer to BETA will be deleted upon the official server release[/li] [li]This means you will lose any experience and items that you previously earned[/li] [li]There will most likely be various updates through each day; this is something we have to do[/li] [li]We will post any updates on the news board[/li] [li]BETA players will receive special rewards (see below)[/li][/ul]
[hr]
[b][u]BETA Rewards:[/u][/b] As previously stated above, BETA players will receive special rewards that no other player can receive. The rewards that are going to be given are:
[ol][li]In-game Veteran rank[/li] [li]20% experience boost towards all skills[/li] [li]Secret and unique item that cannot be traded and vanishes when dropped[/li][/ol]
These rewards will most likely be redetermined, but right now we aren't fully concerned with this matter.
ENJOY BETA and remember to post all bugs!
[quote="Fails"]My honest opinion: This is a great server. Even though it's in BETA mode, it's worth playing. So much to do... so little time. :rolleyes:[/quote]

item.title: Rune-Pact Beta - Unique - Economy Based
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

bump

As of right now, there has been no major updates due to the developers having real-life issues to tend to. Well, there are updates going on, they have just been minor. Here in the next few days, Jaxus will be releasing some big, juicy updates whenever his plate clears.

Thanks for understanding guys. Don’t lose hope in Rune-Pact!

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-Pact Beta - Unique - Economy Based
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

This server deserves a bump.

The RP forums, along with the server, are under construction. So, when you register the forum may look a little bare, just hang in there. The developers are working tirelessly to bring you all, the players, a fun and enjoyable gaming experience. You all should definitely try this out, especially whilst it’s in BETA mode, that way you all may suggest future updates and such.

You won’t regret it.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-Pact Beta - Unique - Economy Based
item.dc:creator: @Jaxus Jaxus
item.description:
@Jaxus wrote:

Face it, you will never see anything unique unless it is a custom made item, which we do not plan to do. Also, the client does support the 459 gameframe, but that is just a bug, which will be fixed as soon as I get a chance. I honestly didn’t want to this thread to be created until at least another week, because there is still so much to do.

dObb8.png765×501

Read full topic

item.description:

Good luck my friend.

EDIT:
Realized it says Gameframe: 459

Whereas the gameframe is 474.[/quote]
The gameframe is actually 459. Loginscreen is pretty unique. Allot of other unique features will be added. Now we have to setup a communtiy and an economy.
